name: Occultus Iter
description:
A game made for Hisar Jam 2!

The theme was Contrast, so my idea is that you need to find your way using the contrasts between the black path and the light (using your "power" to create light).

I did it myself in my spare time, so it's pretty sketchy, obviously.

It actually has only 2 levels.

After the Jam I will try to keep improving and adding new levels to it, I really loved this project.
